#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

#define llu unsigned long long

llu multiply(llu a, llu b, llu m) {
    llu q = (llu)(((long double)a*(long double)b)/(long double)m);
    llu r = a*b - q*m;
    
    r = r%m;
    if(r<0) r += m;
    
    return r;
}    

bool fact(llu n, llu b) {
    /*
    if(n==0 and (b/2) == 1) return false;
    if(n==0 and (b/2) != 1) return true;
    */
    llu mul = 1,m=2*b;
    for(llu i=1;i<=n;i++) {
        mul = multiply(mul,i,m);
    }    
    
    if(mul>=b) return false;
    else return true;
}    

int main() {
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    
    int t;
    llu n,b;
    
    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        cin>>n>>b;
        if(fact(n,b)) cout<<"Even\n";
        else cout<<"Odd\n";
    }    
    
    return 0;
}
